headline: Evercore ISI shifts oil stock ratings as SLB upgraded and peers cut
summary: Investing.com -- Evercore ISI has made a series of rating changes across major oil and energy names, upgrading SLB to Outperform while cutting Halliburton, Canadian Natural Resources and BP to In Line.

headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Nvidia, AMD, JPMorgan, Zeta Global, Vistra, Microchip, and More

headline: Does Halliburton's (HAL) Insider Alignment Reinforce or Complicate Its Oilfield Services Upside Narrative?
summary: In early January 2026, Halliburton reported that its Eastern Hemisphere president holds company shares and equity awards, drawing attention as oilfield services stocks extended a sector-wide rally ahead of the company’s quarterly results scheduled for January 21. This combination of sector-wide optimism and visible insider alignment has sharpened investor focus on how upcoming earnings may reflect current operating conditions. We’ll now examine how strong sector sentiment and fresh insider...
